name: Lunar
description:
A small game i'm working on to mark the 50th anniversary of Apollo 11. 

You have to land the craft on the white target. each round gets a bit faster.. See how far you get.

CONTROLS: 

Arrows or W,A,S,D for direction, 

Space to perform burn (you only have 3 sec each round)

'm' will skip the music tack

This is still in development and will have some nice facts about Apollo 11 each time you level up. 

Cool Facts - all the radio chatter you hear in the background is real, its from the lander to capcom..

**Known issues

- the altitude measuring goes a little crazy sometimes

- Firing thrust can sometimes stay on (particularly in the faster rounds)
